detectors.description: CouponClipper.redeem(address,uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CouponClipper.sol#49-63) ignores return value by ESD.transfer(_user,_couponAmount - botFee) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CouponClipper.sol#62)

CouponClipper.redeem(address,uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CouponClipper.sol#49-63) may have integer overflow

	- ESD.transfer(_user,_couponAmount - botFee) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CouponClipper.sol#62)
